name: BABUL FILMS SOCIETY

address: S-4, Saregama Apts. opp International School, Shaikpetnala

briefDescription: Babul Films Society is a registered non-profit NGO based out of Hyderabad. We spread awareness about Environment, Biodiversity and Sustainable Development using Short Videos and Social media as tools in addition to traditional advocacy methods. In a democratic setup, awareness is the key to live and progress sustainably; Babul Films works to spread knowledge among ignorant and push the aware towards action.
